title: Ceremonias Ancestrales Perú, Retiros Shamanicos, Ceremonia San Pedro Wachuma
cleaned_text: of the Qeros community, who maintain their ancestral traditions of relating to nature to heal and release the negative energies in us The San Pedro Wachuma Ceremony is personalized and takes place in open and natural spaces next to a river, with a walk of approximately 15 minutes visiting archaeological sites built in the time of the Incas, such as the Temple of the Moon and the Capac Ñan or sacred path, the place is very quiet... Awakening, self-knowledge, and the liberation of physical, emotional, mental, spiritual burdens, show us traditional forms, which have transcended in time, through Andean ceremonies.
